content: crocheted pot-holders with treble crochets and relief-treble crochets in drops paris the piece is worked in the round from the middle outwards theme christmas pattern no w-822 yarn group c or a + a **size** approx 22 cm in diameter **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g colour 62 sage green 100 g colour 25 moss green **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 10½ row in height = 10 x 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm
